cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a scheduling problem in which a cloud service provider has to schedule jobs submitted by selfish clients. This problem falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT) as it involves designing a truthful online mechanism to maximize social welfare. The paper also discusses learning from expert advice, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The problem of scheduling jobs can also be seen as a problem in data structures (cs.DS) as it involves managing multiple units of a resource over time. Finally, the paper discusses regret analysis, which is a common topic in information theory (cs.IT).
